pullRequest.title: [DB TimeLock] 1D.2/3C.1 - Validation of DB TimeLock Multiple Series Mode
pullRequest.bodyText:
Goals (and why):

Test the multi-series work for DB TimeLock #5014 well.

Implementation Description (bullets):

Add a test that would previously have failed but now passes.

Testing (What was existing testing like?  What have you done to improve it?):
I added a test.
Concerns (what feedback would you like?):
Nothing much.
Where should we start reviewing?: the one file
Priority (whenever / two weeks / yesterday): asap, this is small

nodes.bodyText: minor: you can add assertion that other was fastforwarded, not necessary if it's already covered by other tests.
